name: autonomous-minecraft-bot
description: Enterprise-grade autonomous Minecraft bot with persistent storage, web dashboard, and plugin system

scripts.validate: node -c index.js && node -c src/*.js && echo '✓ All files validated'
scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('✓ Environment loaded'); console.log('Host:', process.env.MINECRAFT_HOST); console.log('Telegram:', process.env.TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN ? 'Configured' : 'Not configured'); console.log('Gemini AI:', process.env.GEMINI_API_KEY ? 'Configured' : 'Not configured');"
